lead_paragraph: David Zuchowski had led the American unit of the South Korean company for nearly three years, as the U.S. market shifted away from Hyundai’s strengths.

headline.print_headline: Hyundai’s U.S. Chief Is Out, as the Automaker Seeks to Rekindle Growth
headline.main: Hyundai’s U.S. Chief Is Out, as Automaker Seeks to Rekindle Growth
